price: Ey iman edenler! Kat kat arttırılmış olarak faiz yemeyin. Allah’a karşı gelmekten sakının ki, kurtuluşa eresiniz.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَأۡكُلُواْ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓاْ أَضۡعَٰفٗا مُّضَٰعَفَةٗۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takulū al-riba aḍʿāfan muḍāʿafatan wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
